allow: Bash(# Check where starship looks for config echo ""Default starship config locations:"" echo "" ~/.config/starship.toml"" ls -la ~/.config/starship.toml || echo "" Not found"" echo """" echo ""Checking if starship can read the config:"" STARSHIP_CONFIG=~/.config/starship.toml starship print-config 2>&1)
Bash(# Check if Tailscale SSH is enabled at tailnet level /Applications/Tailscale.app/Contents/MacOS/Tailscale status:*)

Bash(# Check if Tailscale app is set to open at login via modern ServiceManagement sqlite3 /Users/sudeep/Library/Application\\ Support/com.apple.sharedfilelist/com.apple.LSSharedFileList.ApplicationRecentDocuments/com.tailscale.ipn.macsys.sfl* || echo ""No recent docs"" # Check if Tailscale daemon registers at boot via the bundle plutil -p /Applications/Tailscale.app/Contents/Info.plist)
Bash(# Verify Network Extension persistence sudo systemextensionsctl list)
